Name: Tech Lab
Description: Enables additional units and research options. A Tech Lab can fit onto any production structure.

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Increases the starting energy of **Medivacs** by 25.
Root.Name: Research Caduceus Reactor

Root.Tooltip: Enables **Banshees** to use the Cloak ability. Cloak renders the **Banshee** invisible to enemies unless the unit is revealed by detectors or effects.
Root.Name: Research Cloaking Field

Root.Tooltip: Increases the starting energy of **Ravens** by 150.
Root.Name: Research Corvid Reactor

Root.Tooltip: Extends the timed duration of Raven Auto-Turrets and **Point Defense Drones**.
Root.Name: Research Durable Materials

Root.Tooltip: Enables **Ravens** to use the Seeker Missile armament. This missile activates after 5 seconds, dealing 100 AoE damage to the target if they are still within range.
Root.Name: Research Seeker Missile

Root.Tooltip: Enables **Liberators** to transform into a siege ranged anti-ground unit.
Root.Name: Research Defender Mode

Root.Tooltip: Increases the movement speed of **Banshees**.
Root.Name: Research Hyperflight Rotors

Root.Tooltip: Increases the healing of the Raven Type-II's Bio-Mechanical Repair Drone by 25% and allows it to cloak units that it is currently healing.
Root.Name: Research Covert Triage

Root.Tooltip: **Ravens** can target up to 4 units with Target Lock.
Root.Name: Research Multi-Threaded Sensors

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 12.
Root.Name: Research Covert Triage

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 3.
Root.Name: Multi-Threaded Sensors

Root.Tooltip: Upgrades the Banshee's attack to fire multiple missile bursts in a straight line.
Root.Name: Research Shockwave Missile Battery

Root.Tooltip: **Wraiths** move 20% faster and evade 20% of incoming attacks while cloaked.
Root.Name: Research Displacement Field

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Covert Banshees** to use Rocket Barrage, which deals 75 damage to enemy ground units in the target area.
Root.Name: Research Rocket Barrage

Root.Tooltip:
**Wraith** attack speed increases by 10% with each attack, up to a maximum of 100%.

Passive ability.
Root.Name: Research Trigger Override

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 10.
Root.Name: Research Rocket Barrage

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 13.
Root.Name: Research Shockwave Missile Battery

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 13.
Root.Name: Research Displacement Field

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 7.
Root.Name: Trigger Override

Root.Tooltip: Increases the damage of Gemini Missiles by 100% and Burst Lasers by 300% while the **Wraith** is moving.
Root.Name: Research Pulse Amplifier

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Covert Banshees** to remain permanently cloaked.
Root.Name: Research Advanced Cloaking Field

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Wraiths** to remain permanently cloaked.
Root.Name: Research Unregistered Cloaking System

Root.Tooltip: **Wraiths**, **Vikings**, and **Ravens** can use Tactical Jump, warping them to any visible location.
Root.Name: Research Tactical Jump

Root.Tooltip: Allows the Raven Type-II to store up to 3 charges for each of its abilities.
Root.Name: Research Enhanced Manufacturing

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 12.
Root.Name: Research Enhanced Manufacturing

Root.Tooltip: Enables **Liberators** to transform into a siege ranged anti-ground unit.
Root.Name: Research Defender Mode

Root.Tooltip: Increases the range of Liberators in Defender Mode by 4.
Root.Name: Advanced Ballistics

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Raid Liberators** to transform between modes four times faster.
Root.Name: Research Smart Servos

Root.Tooltip: Science Vessel's Nano-Repair no longer costs energy.
Root.Name: Research Improved Nano-Repair

Root.Tooltip: **Vikings** in Fighter Mode can launch 5 rockets at an enemy. Each rocket deals 25 (40 vs armored) damage to the target unit.
Root.Name: Research W.I.L.D. Missiles

Root.Tooltip: **Viking** weapons system upgrade. Increases air attack range by 2 and ground attack range by 1.
Root.Name: Research Phobos Weapons System

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 10.
Root.Name: Research Smart Servos

Root.Tooltip: The Medivac deploys loaded troops twice as fast.
Root.Name: Research Rapid Deployment

Root.Tooltip: Enables **Science Vessels** to surround a target with a shield that can absorb 200 damage over 20 seconds.
Root.Name: Research Defensive Matrix

Root.Tooltip: Upgrades the Viking's missiles to deal area damage.
Root.Name: Research Ripwave Missiles

Root.Tooltip: Attacks from **Vikings** in Assault Mode pierce, dealing damage to enemy units behind the target. **Viking** transform time reduced by 75%.
Root.Name: Research Shredder Rounds

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Raid Liberators** to attack structures while in Defender Mode.
Root.Name: Research Raid Artillery

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 13.
Root.Name: Research Viking Ripwave Missiles

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 13.
Root.Name: Research Defensive Matrix

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 7.
Root.Name: Shredder Rounds

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 10.
Root.Name: Research Raid Artillery

Root.Tooltip: Increases the Seeker Missile's damage by 30% and its tracking range by 50%.
Root.Name: Recalibrated Explosives

Root.Tooltip: Increases the Raven's Anti-Armor Missile explosion radius by 20% and its tracking range by 50%.
Root.Name: Research Enhanced Munitions

Root.Tooltip: The <span style="color: #ffff8a">Medivac/c> can heal two targets at once.
Root.Name: Research Advanced Healing AI

Behaviors.Tooltip: This structure's fire is being extinguished and is repairing itself to 50% of its maximum life.
This structure's fire is being extinguished and is repairing itself to 50% of its maximum life.
